channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No road markings to prevent blocking driveway, 2nd October
item.description:
No. 18 has a driveway on this road across the whole house but no dropped kerb. Some people unintentionally park on the road in front blocking the cars on the driveway. It will be good to have white lines on the road covering the whole driveway so people know not to park here.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, The Close, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: 'Men at work' sign left, 2nd October

item.title: Road closed sign left in hedge, 2nd October
item.description:

item.title: Trees and bushes opposite houses on Barrington Avenue, 2nd October
item.description:
The trees and bushes opposite the houses on Barrington Avenue need cutting back as they are overhanging the road and with cars opposite it is a safety hazzard
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Barrington Avenue, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
